content: Tejas Mahajan is a data scientist working on applied machine learning problems. He lately has been working on computer vision problems and has created working state of the pipelines for optical character recognition on specific documents. He is currently working on problem statements encompassing building learning algorithms involving multiple data modalities like image and text.
summary: Tejas Mahajan is a data scientist working on applied machine learning problems. He lately has been working on computer vision problems and has created working state of the pipelines for optical character recognition on specific documents.
title: Tejas Mahajan

content:
I have co-written this blog along with my friend Niraj Pandkar, please do give it a read using the link below:
https://towardsdatascience.com/how-we-built-an-inexpensive-scalable-architecture-to-cartoonize-the-world-8610050f90a0
summary: Read to get an understand of how we deployed a web app for an open source cartoonizer project and adapted it to run for short videos too. [Click to get to the Medium link]
title: How we built an inxepensive scalable architecture to cartoonize the world?
